description: Contribute to a full-stack telecommunication system. The application utilizes a Vue.js and Typescript front end, and both Java and Golang microservices for the back end.
Contribute to a full-stack telecommunication system. The application utilizes a Vue.js and Typescript front end, and both Java and Golang microservices for the back end.
Developed systems in Golang to empower investment managers to focus on their investments, free from concerns about underlying architecture and software.
Consulted with a client and worked on a trading algorithm for a specific commodity.
